Features

Why Choose CutefishOS?

Powerful Base System
CutefishOS is a fusion of Debian base system created by Debian and Debian’s strong community, and a beautiful Desktop environment in the Linux world, Cutefish Desktop Environment. With the stable Kernel of Debian and better support on Graphics Drivers, CutefishOS can be your next favorite Operating system.


Beautiful Designs
Talking about the UI, It has a modern and efficient User interface for stunning user experience. It has a Modern Dock that gives users a convenient place to access apps and features.


Debian Software
CutefishOS yields and operates software packages from Debian Repository. As we know, Debian repository mirrors are spreaded worldwide. Hence, make the updates faster, easier and stable. The CutefishOS team ensures that the CDE packages from the upstream (Linux Cutefish Repository) also will be distributing the current immense CDE via Over-The-Air (OTA) update.


Control Center
With intuitive design CutefishOS provides the very Modern Control center to its users. Which we can say All in one Control center that is easier for users to access and control on different aspects of the system. From system configuration, user accounts management to customization, you get all in the single dash.


File Manager
Including Modern look and Eye pleasing experience, File Manager consists of decent file management system that allows users to manage their files in an elegant manner.


Cutefish Desktop Environment
An astonishing Desktop Environment in the Linux world that is originally designed and maintained by Cutefish and Cutefish Community. CDE consists of the Desktop Environment, Window Manager, Control Center, Launcher and Dock. CDE is a modern looking elegant desktop environment giving a different taste of desktop experience.

About:

CutefishOS is an elegant, beautiful and easy-to-use Linux desktop operating system. It runs Cutefish Desktop has a modern style design. Our goal is to provide users with a comfortable interface design, better user experience and a better choice.
